title: ISic004334. I.Sicily inscription 004334
body:
Facsimile Images

((cross_uninterpreted)) Μνήστητη Κ(ύρι)ε
τοῦ δούλου σου Ν-
ικολάου κὲ Θεοδ-
οσίας τῆς συμβίου αυτοῦ (uncertain restoration)
5[---]
5[---] Α-
ρκαδίου
[---]

Apparatus criticus

Italian translation

Ricordati, Signore, del tuo servo Nikolaos e di Theodosia (?) sua moglie...

English translation

Remember, Lord, your servant Nikolaos and his wife Theodosia (?) ...

commentary

  • 61.0741 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
